Configuration

Remote User

  1. Create user for remote access:

    # useradd -m remote
# passwd remote
> <NEW-USER-PASSWORD>
> <NEW-USER-PASSWORD (VERIFY)>
# ls -A /home/remote/ | xargs rm -rf

  2. Add user to admin group:

    # usermod -G wheel remote
